results.title: Those wild wild mushrooms
results.creator_credit: Art Makosinski, F Whitman Trecartin, Rex Tasker and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A happy-go-lucky film that should appeal to anyone interested in eating and stocking an inexpensive source of food. The information is built into a comic story about two experienced mushroom pickers and one novice, and their respective perambulations through the woods. Close-ups are supplemented by descriptions of the mushrooms, and a warning is issued not to pick what you can’t clearly identify, given the similarity between the poisonous and non-poisonous varieties.

results.title: Those who mourn
results.brief_description: An American wife experiences flashbacks of her husband’s death and of her past life with her husband. Shocked and traumatised she tries to understand what has happened, and what future lies before her.

results.title: Those unforgettable school days = 难忘中学时光
results.creator_credit: Lu Jianhua, Dai Lu, Yu Zhongxiao and Changchun Film Studio
results.brief_description:
Zhou Yi is a smart graduating student from the Yellow Sea senior high; he has a younger sister who is currently attending junior high school. Due to the loss of their father in their early childhood, their sick mother is supporting the whole family alone, earning their tuition fees by working odd jobs continuously.

After Zhou Yi discovers his mother wishes him to quit school and work after graduating high school, he breaks down and blames his mother for not being understanding. In order to support Zhou Yi, Zhou Yi’s mother starts working day and night in secret to make up for their tuition fees, but due to her original health condition she finally falls ill. Under such circumstances Zhou Yi has no choice but to give up his university dream and work to support his sister’s education.

Zhou Yi’s school mentor comes along and encourages Zhou Yi to not give up; Zhou Yi decides to follow the mentor’s guidance and he continues to work while studying at the same time. The exam period finishes, Zhou Yi is unable to participate in the exams; he sits beside his ice lolly cart, is once again left in his own thoughts.

Zhou Yi’s mentor comes over and hands him the poem journal he once threw away into the sea, tells him she has already forwarded his poems to a publishing agent. Zhou Yi pulls himself together, decides to embark upon a new journey to fulfill his university dream.
(Wendy Xu, 2013).

results.title: Those magnificent men in their flying machines or How I flew from London to Paris in 25 hours and 11 minutes
results.creator_credit: Ken Annakin, Stan Margulies and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
results.brief_description: This farcical comedy based loosely on the historic 1910 London to Paris air race features the greatest aviators from around the world. They all come together when a stuffy, but very rich, newspaper publisher decides to sponsor an airplane race across the English Channel. The often hilarious escapades between the American, British, French, German, Italian and Japanese teams results in some of the most daring and hilarious in-flight acrobatics ever filmed.

results.title: Those awful hats
results.creator_credit: D.W. Griffith and American Mutoscope and Biograph Company
results.brief_description: Women wearing hats in the cinema can be rather annoying particularly if they obscure your line of vision. A comic short. Cast includes Mack Sennett, Flora Finch, Linda Arvidson, John R. Cumpson, George Gebhardt. Silent film with no intertitles.

results.title: Thoroughly modern Millie
results.creator_credit: George Roy Hill, Ross Hunter, Ross Hunter Productions and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: The Roaring Twenties come to life in this Academy Award winning musical starring Julie Andrews as the naive Millie, a country girl who comes to the big city in search of a husband. She befriends the sweet Miss Dorothy played by Mary Tyler Moore, fends off white slaver Mrs. Meers (Beatrice Lillie) and meets up with Muzzy played by Carol Channing who manages to solve all of Millie’s romantic problems which involve her boss (John Gavin) and paperclip salesman James Fox.

results.title: Thoroughbred
results.creator_credit: Pen Densham, John Watson, Pyramid Films and Insight Productions (US)
results.brief_description: Opens with scenes of a race meeting, then moves through the whole cycle of a horse’s life: the birth in winter, foals playing in spring, yearlings being taken to sales as autumn approaches, the sales arena and bidding for the livestock, the patient year of training, and lastly, a slow motion race sequence.

results.title: Thorncliffe: the story of British industrial enterprise
results.brief_description: The story of a large organisation that has grown up in the Thorncliffe Valley, near Sheffield, from an iron foundry erected when iron ore was discovered there in the 16th century.
